short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Raise money for charity with every browser tab you open!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Raise money for charity with every tab you open in Chrome! Just by surfing the web, you can build libraries, plant trees, send emergency aid, give clean water, and more. Choose your favorite charity to support!

Tab for a Cause transforms your "new tab" page. Each time you open a tab, you will be greeted with an incredible new tab page filled with custom widgets, pictures, and a couple banner ads. We collect ad revenue from the page and use it to donate to the cause you are supporting!

People like you have raised over $1M for charity just by surfing the web. Join them by adding the extension now!

Learn more at https://tab.gladly.io.

Your Privacy Matters
Tab for a Cause is committed to protecting your privacy and using your data responsibly. We save information relevant to your profile on Tab for a Cause (such as your preferences and new tab page widgets). We do not collect any information we do not need.

The new tab page contains advertisements that help us raise money for charity. These ads are delivered by our advertising partners. These partners may collect anonymized data about you in order to show you ads you'll be interested in.

For more info, check out our privacy policy at:
https://tab.gladly.io/privacy/
